name: Account Creation
script:
name=doc.customer_name
company = doc.custom_comapny

abr=frappe.db.get_value('Company',company,'abbr')
frappe.errprint(abr)

    
acc = frappe.new_doc("Account")
acc.account_name = name 
acc.parent_account = 'Sundry Debtors'+" - "+abr
acc.account_type = 'Receivable'
acc.insert(ignore_permissions=True,
             )
acc.save()
account_name= acc.name
    
doc.append("accounts", {
        "account": account_name,
        "company": company
     
        
})
doc.save()

name: account creation supplier
script:
name=doc.supplier_name
company=doc.custom_company

abr=frappe.db.get_value('Company',company,'abbr')
frappe.errprint(abr)

    
acc = frappe.new_doc("Account")
acc.account_name = name 
acc.parent_account = 'Sundry Creditors'+" - "+abr
acc.account_type = 'Payable'
acc.insert(ignore_permissions=True,
             )
acc.submit()
account_name= acc.name
    
doc.append("accounts", {
        "account": account_name,
        "company":company
     
        
})
doc.save()
